api

Class SIPConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.SIPConnector

  • public class SIPConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    SIP connection. Expects information to be formatted Usage: SIPConnector instance = new SIPConnector.Builder("eplapp","6001").build(); assertTrue(instance.test());
    Author:
    Andrew Nisbet

      • getCode

        public static int getCode(java.lang.String receivedData)
        Returns the return code from the received message.
        Parameters:
        receivedData - the String data received from the SIP server.
        Returns:
        the code returned or -1 if the recvData string cannot be parsed, is too short or missing, or cannot be parsed into an integer.
        See Also:
        getCode(java.lang.String, int)

      • getCode

        public static int getCode(java.lang.String receivedData,
          int codeLength)
        Returns the return code from the received message.
        Parameters:
        receivedData - the String data received from the SIP server.
        codeLength - the value of codeLength, usually two digit code.
        Returns:
        the code returned or -1 if the recvData string cannot be parsed, is too short or missing, or cannot be parsed into an integer.
        See Also:
        getCode(java.lang.String)
